page.syntax: V a5_xbasic_to_arguments(C xbasic ,P args [,N mode [,* varFrame [,C varName [,* sessionVars [,C __dtfmt ]]]]])
page.description: Converts Xbasic code that defines variables to SQL Arguments. Mode= 2 - instead of passing in xbasic, pass in crlf string of form argname|type|value. If mode = 2 you can also pass in a variable frame so that the xbasic is of the form argname|type|dotvariablename
